entries.title: 18 best robot vacuum deals: Top Eufy, iRobot, Roborock holiday sales
entries.description: Cyber Monday may be over, but the holiday deals are here. Save hundreds on a robot vacuum with these great deals available to make hosting easier.

entries.title: 12 phones that make great holiday gifts in 2022
entries.description: We've rounded up a list of the 12 best phones to give as gifts. There's something for everyone, even if you're on a budget.

entries.title: Qualcomm readies Wi-Fi 7 platform for your home mesh networking needs
entries.description: The new chips will provide higher capacity and better handling of interference and congestion. But don't expect to see them in mesh systems until later next year.

entries.title: The 5 best solar gifts of 2022
entries.description: What better way to light up someone's life in an era of climate change than a gift powered by the sun? We found the best solar gifts this holiday season.

entries.title: Twitter Blue is back, and it's pricier for iPhone users
entries.description: Twitter botched it the first time, but the paid subscription service is back.

entries.title: Lawmakers introduce a bill that could ban TikTok in the US
entries.description: Privacy concerns motivate US lawmakers to create a bill that protects US data from being shared with foreign adversaries.

entries.title: Hyperice Normatec 3 Legs review: Recharge like a pro athlete
entries.description: It's not very portable and it's definitely not cheap, but the Hyperice Normatec 3 Legs system is an effective way to reduce your post-workout soreness.

entries.title: 11 robot toys that make great gifts in 2022
entries.description: If you want to spark the imagination of your kids and help them hone tech skills they'll need as adults, check out this list of our favorite tech toys.

entries.title: Laptop deal: Save $800 on Acer Porsche Design, now just $600
entries.description: A lightweight design and a 14-inch screen make this a designer's dream on-the-go laptop.

entries.title: How to reset your HomePod Mini
entries.description: The HomePod Mini can be your go-to speaker, your smart home companion, or both. But how do you reset your HomePod after it's been set up?

entries.title: Apple brings the iPhone 14's satellite-powered SOS service to Europe
entries.description: After launching the Emergency SOS via satellite service last month, it's now available for iPhone 14 users in France, Germany, Ireland and the UK.

entries.title: How to use the iPhone 14 Pro's new Always-On Display on iOS 16.2
entries.description: With the release of iOS 16.2, Apple added some key settings to improve the Always-On Display experience of the iPhone 14 Pro. Here's how to use the new feature.

entries.title: Apple's new Freeform whiteboard app: 3 things you need to know to get started
entries.description: Apple's newest app is a limitless whiteboard you can use solo or collaborate on. We walk you through the basics, but also ask the question of who Freeform is for?

entries.title: Apple just released updates for the iPhone, iPad, Mac, Apple Watch and more: Here's what's new
entries.description: The latest software update for your Apple devices includes a new Freeform app, encrypted iCloud backups, an improved always-on display and more.

entries.title: How to enable the Google One VPN on your Pixel device
entries.description: Android 13 now includes a free VPN, thanks to Google One. Find out how and why you should enable it.

entries.title: What is Android Clear calling and how do you enable it?
entries.description: Do you find the noise during your phone calls on your Pixel 7 to be less than acceptable? If so, there's a new setting you can enable to dramatically improve that.

entries.title: The 4 best iPhone power banks of 2022
entries.description: Stumped for a gift for the iPhone user on your list? Check out the best iPhone power banks. They'll keep iPhones juiced while you're on the go.

entries.title: The 5 best iPad Pro cases of 2022
entries.description: Life can be hectic, so you need to protect your iPad Pro with a case built for a life on the go. Whether it is an added keyboard or an entire carrying case, these are the best iPad Pro cases.

entries.title: The 20 best Amazon security camera holiday deals: Ring and Blink on sale
entries.description: If you're catching up on your holiday shopping, don't pass on home security: ZDNET has gathered the best deals on Amazon's Ring and Blink security cameras so you and yours can stay safe for less.

entries.title: 30 best security camera deals for the 2022 holidays: Arlo, Google, and more on sale
entries.description: Looking for some extra peace of mind at home but don't want to pay full price? With the holidays approaching, retailers are putting out some great security camera deals, so don't miss out.

entries.title: How to connect a Nintendo Switch to your TV
entries.description: Nintendo's most recent console generation is unique in its ability to be undocked and used as a mobile gaming device. But, when you want that big-screen gaming experience, it's important to make sure your Switch and its dock are connected to your TV correctly.

entries.title: This foldable wireless charging stand is a multitasker's dream accessory
entries.description: The Satechi Duo Wireless Charger Power Stand can charge up to three devices at once while keeping your phone upright.

entries.title: Security researchers take a look at Google's VPN by Google One app
entries.description: Google asked NCC Group to conduct a security assessment of VPN by Google One, and it has now published the results.

entries.title: Why your iPad, MacBook, or even iPhone might stop charging this winter
entries.description: Your battery suddenly stopped charging? Thinking you need a new battery or charger? The problem might be simpler than that.

entries.title: This Linux-targeting malware just got more powerful
entries.description: The addition of trojan malware could point to more disruptive cyberattacks to come.

entries.title: Android Private Compute Core: Google explains the "important" new privacy infrastructure
entries.description: Google reveals how Android Private Compute Core can use your device's most sensitive data to improve machine-learning models in the cloud without actually sharing your private data.

entries.title: Microsoft just topped a 'best-run company' list, but other tech firms tumble down the rankings
entries.description: Big tech loses its grip.

entries.title: Struggling to buy a Raspberry Pi? It could be about to get a lot easier
entries.description: More Pi Zero W, 3A+ and 2GB/4GB Raspberry Pi 4s are available ahead of the holiday season, if you know where to look.
